body: Is there a mobile version of Teamspeak, because my mic on my mac is not working and it won't work for anything, but facetime. I was wondering if there was a TS for my phone, since I know my phone's mic works, but I was wondering if it was free, thanks.
body_tagged: Is there a mobile version of Teamspeak, because my mic on my mac is not working and it won't work for anything, but facetime. I was wondering if there was a TS for my phone, since I know my phone's mic works, but I was wondering if it was free, thanks.
title: Teamspeak (Mobile)

replies.body: There is a Teamspeak app on iOS but it costs $4 last time I checked.
replies.body_tagged: There is a Teamspeak app on iOS but it costs $4 last time I checked.

replies.body: Yeah, I rather spend my $4 iOS money on music from Sia, but the next time I get more iTunes credit, maybe I will get it.

replies.body: I had almost the same problem. My computer didn't see microphone, so i thought it was broken and bought a new one. But it wasn't (lol) and when started speaking in TS, everything was okay with both mics.

replies.body:
iOS TeamSpeak app is completely trash and not worth the 4 dollars or what ever it is.

It's full of bugs and somehow I can't connect to some servers using WLAN, just with 3G/4G... Buggy.
replies.body_tagged:
iOS TeamSpeak app is completely trash and not worth the 4 dollars or what ever it is.

It's full of bugs and somehow I can't connect to some servers using WLAN, just with 3G/4G... Buggy.

replies.body: The bugs might only be for you. I have TeamSpeak installed on my iOS device and I've only had roughly 2 minor bugs. Except from those 2 bugs, the TeamSpeak runs smoothly for me.
